ch.hszt.mdp.chatplus.logic.contract.message
Interface IServerMessage

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoardUserList, LoginMessage, SimpleMessage, UserStatusMessage
public interface IServerMessage

Describes a message that must be processed in an IClientContext. This kind of message is issued by the server towards a client.

Author:
sfrick
